title: UCI: Patrick Lefevere Must Apologize or Pay $22,500 Fine for ‘Disparaging’ Comments Toward Women
content:
The fine would be revoked if Soudal-Quick Step manager apologizes and 'does not commit a similar breach of the UCI Code of Ethics within the next three years.'

Read the full article at UCI: Patrick Lefevere Must Apologize or Pay $22,500 Fine for ‘Disparaging’ Comments Toward Women on Velo.
author: ahood
